attributes.action: Impose a 2% wealth tax on those with assets over £10 million.
attributes.additional_details: Labour need to do better at tackling inequality in Britain. They were once the party of the working people. It’s time they remembered that.
attributes.background: Studies have shown that a 2% tax in the wealthiest people would raise billions. This needs to be the way forward rather than Labour’s plan to tax employee pension contributions.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/748774
